name: PHASEAmbientMixerDefinition
desc: An audio-layering object that outputs sound in a particular direction in 3D space.

items.name: init(channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout, orientation: simd_quatf)
items.desc: Creates an ambient mixer with the given channel layout and orientation.

items.name: init(channelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout, orientation: simd_quatf, identifier: String)
items.desc: Creates a named ambient mixer with the given channel layout and orientation.

items.name: var inputChannelLayout: AVAudioChannelLayout
items.desc: The channel layout of input audio.

items.name: var orientation: simd_quatf
items.desc: A quaternion that describes the orientation of the speaker layout relative to the scene origin.
